title: 70% Bots in ARAM
body:
That's what my last game was, 3 bots on my team and 4 on the other. At least one of them I've reported 4-5 days ago, but it's still playing, feeding and clocking up IP. 

There seems to be a new wave every weekend but in ARAM in recent days they ALL have Cleanse and Mark and they all buy Oracle potion at the start. They rarely get kills and always feed.. It's pretty obvious if you look at match histories..

Most also have names with random letters added

I report the same ones over the weekend expecting them to be gone on Monday at least but nooo, they're still killing my fun. If anything, there's more!! And  this last game, the guy on the other side just left, didn't report so that's only 2 reports for that game because 7 of 10 players were bots.. so 20% report rate is that even enough for you guys to look into it? Just disappointing and a waste of time when I get into champ select and see the same bot/s I reported days ago, why would I bother.

And if I dodge a game because I know there's a bot or 2 or 3 on the team, I get penalised.. I have to play with the feeding bot or I don't play at all?

Please clean up your game Riot, the bots are bad  :(

replies.body:
Know the feeling. Also had a game where   it was  2V1 players and rest bots.

They are getting smarter though, they now random Honor peeps so I suppose you can get something out of the Game. 

Look at it as a chance to pick up an S and Chest, Free Loot is always good.

And keep Reporting, One day someone from Riot might decide to give a Damn and do something about it.

Riot can't work out how to stop the bots that's why it's been going on so long. They also don't care about fixing the issue because it's only ARAM. If it was ranked or any other mode they might look into it but ARAM they just stick their heads in the ground.

Personally, I just leave the game if it's filled with bots, I'm not going to waste 20 minutes of my time playing with cheaters. I will just message support if i get penalised for leaving a game full of bots and Riot can compensate me for lost time. ;)
